name: visual-json
description: Library for creating user interfaces from json files.

scripts.bundle: rm -R dist/visual-bundle.js; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -x react -t babelify -t uglifyify src/index.js > dist/visual-bundle.js
scripts.dist: rm -R dist/visual.js; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t babelify -t uglifyify --standalone visual src/index.js > dist/visual.js
scripts.dist-debug: rm -R dist/visual.js; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify --debug -t babelify --standalone visual src/index.js > dist/visual.js
